snippet.title: Hazard Run for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

This racing game is based on "The Dukes of Hazzard", in which you, as the Dukes, have to outrace the police. Your car will automatically go faster, but you can use a brake. The brake, however, is limited and if you use it too much, it will say "BRAKE" at the lower right of the screen.

The car also needs fuel, so be sure to drive oever gasoline cans.

You also have to avoid obstacles, like trees or rocks (among others). There is also water, which will speed your car up...if you land on the other half of the terrain. 


What I think:

It's not terrible, but it still is frustrating to play nonetheless. Your car is too long\big and the brake limit can be quite a nuisance...

Overall, it is just...well, meh.
